description:
A set that includes additional events that can be played with the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV: Diplomacy and Strategy Expansion Pack Bundle".

Note: This product is included in the "ROMANCE OF THE THREE KINGDOMS XIV Season Pass 2". Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

â–¼Added events
"Prodigy of Tianshui", "Jiang Wei Swears Fealty", "Wang Lang's Outrage", "Battle of Jieting", and "Mournful Execution"

Overview:
The events depict Zhuge Liang's northern campaign, one which he had started in order to fulfill the wishes of late Liu Bei. During the events, Zhuge Liang meets Jiang Wei, the prodigy of Tianshui, takes part in a debate with Wang Lang, battles over Jieting, the vital ground for the campaign, and more.

Note: Events also occur in other scenarios.
name: "Zhuge Liang's Northern Campaign" Event Set
